document_data.name: Zirconium
document_data.mainbody: '''Zirconium''' was an elemental material found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Availability: In {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}, the [[Elemental Store]] of [[Karsus Enclave]] sold pure elemental zirconium bricks for 15 [[gp]] per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}}.
document_data.Usages: * Zirconium was used by the [[Netherese]] in certain metalworking and smelting processes.
